channel.title: Server Discussion Forum?
channel.description:
Hello :P
I came onto MoparScape and wanted to discuss something I found in the Runescape Private Server protocol, however, there was no section for it. The only section it would be remotely close to falling in would be general programming, but that section prohibits the talk of Runescape Private Servers.
So i'm asking, why isn't there a Server Discussion forum for people to collaborate about Runescape Private Servers? Correct me if i'm wrong.

item.title: Server Discussion Forum?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I think this should be added.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Discussion Forum?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Ignore Andrew, he’s a narrow-minded person. You can post in either the general discussion board or the dev board.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Discussion Forum?
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:5, topic:396578”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=493751.msg3609881#msg3609881 date=1306463187]

Because the only thing in it would be flaming topics about how everyone is to lazy to work on new servers.

Then prohibit flaming topics about how everyone is too lazy to work on new servers from the forum (Like is done to a lot of other forums)? Plus, I bet we could get a lot accomplished with a little collaboration in that forum.

This community doesn’t listen to the rules, look at the RuneScape section, every day someone post that they have been hacked, even though a major rule is not to complain about being hacked.
[/quote]
Then the thread gets locked. Not really a problem in my eyes, as the section would have more pros than cons like that.[/quote]

The Mods have enough to do. Why make them do more?

Read full topic
